content: Can issuers making samples available for the Connectathon let us know their issuer URL and name? We're creating a temporary directory file with similar format to the VCI Directory at https://github.com/the-commons-project/vci-directory for verifiers to test against today.

Thanks Neelima - Kevin and I have the issuer url below for any QR codes we provide today & tomorrow:
https://apporchard.epic.com/interconnect-aocurprd-oauth/api/epic/2021/Security/Open/EcKeys/32001/SHC/.well-known/jwks.json
Thanks! Added to the sample directory at https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dvci/health_cards/connectathon/connectathon-issuers.json.
